meanings.definition: The period of time just before dusk.
meanings.sent1: During the predusk, the sky is painted with beautiful colors.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed a peaceful walk during the predusk.
meanings.sent3: The birds chirped happily as the predusk approached.
meanings.sent4: The predusk was like a gentle transition from day to night.
meanings.sent5: The predusk cast a magical glow over the landscape.

meanings.definition: To occur or take place during the time just before dusk.
meanings.sent1: The party will predusk, so make sure to arrive early.
meanings.sent2: Our meeting predusks, so we need to wrap up quickly.
meanings.sent3: The surprise announcement predusks right before the main event.
meanings.sent4: The excitement predusks the arrival of the special guests.
meanings.sent5: The music predusks the start of the fireworks display.
